headline: Assessing Generac Holdings (GNRC) Valuation After Weak Results And Optimistic 2026 Outlook
summary: Generac Holdings (GNRC) is back in focus after reporting a fourth quarter swing to a net loss alongside full year earnings pressure, then pairing those results with upbeat 2026 guidance and a fresh share repurchase authorization. See our latest analysis for Generac Holdings. Those mixed results and the new buyback sit alongside a sharp share price rebound, with a 30 day share price return of 35.93% and a 1 year total shareholder return of 69.46%, suggesting momentum has picked up after a...
